songs.title: Mile Away
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
TK Kravitz
I just told your girlfriend to drop a pin (brr)
Yeah (let's go), yeah (let's go)

[Verse 1]
We been textin' all day now I'm goin' for the win (go, yeah)
Everytime I touch the Hen' man I tend to sin (pray to God, pray to God, yeah)
We see you niggas throwin' shots but y'all ain't hit the rim
Now I'm divin' in, I'm blue like I got a [?]

[Chorus]
I see bullshit from a mile away, ooh (ooh)
I do the best I can to keep that shit away, ooh (ooh)
I end up in depression when I'm thinkin' 'bout my ex
I'm livin' life right now but I'm always thinkin' next
I'm focusin' on me right now, I can't even flex
I'm focusin' on me right now, I can't even flex

[Verse 2]
It's my time to shine (shine)
I love when money hit my line (yeah)
If they ask I'm doin' fine, yeah, yeah (yeah)
I don't sign shit if I don't get my fair share, yeah
I was fucked up now I spend like I don't care
Need an endorsement I drink too much Belaire (drink, drink)
I'm fresh as hell, I can tell how they stare
But they on bullshit I can feel it in the air

[Chorus]
I see bullshit from a mile away, ooh (ooh)
I do the best I can to keep that shit away, ooh (ooh)
I end up in depression when I'm thinkin' 'bout my ex
I'm livin' life right now but I'm always thinkin' next
I'm focusin' on me right now, I can't even flex
I'm focusin' on me right now, I can't even flex

[Outro]
Yeah, ay
Yeah, ay
Yeah, ay
Oh yeah
Ooh, ooh
Yeah, ay
Ooh, ooh
